name: Once Mine (Horo Bunny)
description:
You are a woman named Clara. You wake up on a beach and realize that you've lost your memories. You need to get them back if you want to escape the nightmare you've waken up in.

--------------------------

How to play:

  • Arrow Keys - Movement
  • Z - Interact
  • X - Cancel
  • Enter - Pause

--------------------------
